resources.string:
"This is Android porting of Hybrid Editor "xe",
" " Source code:http://www.geocities.jp/sakachin2/index.htm
" " By Mizumaki-machi
" "
" " Currently following functions are not yet supported.
" " Printing, Remote file access.
" "
" "Push "Menu" button for Configuration and detail Helps.
" "(After Android-3,touch titlebar).
" "Help:
" " Axe Help:Related to Android version.
" " XE Help :Common help for all version.
" " It requres Asset installation.
" " Menu-->Settings
" " -->Download addtional asset.
" " National language support for Help text.
" " You can prepare UTF-8 encoded text file on sdcard.
" " (/sdcard folder depends the device,
" " it may be /mnt/sdcard.)
" " /sdcard/Axe/nls/nls/subject.txt."
" " subject:same as Help dialog title replacing
" " space to under score.
" " ex) "About_Axe".
" " When using multiple language,
" " Prepare /sdcard/Axe/nls/nls_xx/subject.txt
" " for each language.
" " xx:language like as "de" or "ja".
" "Settings:
" " select "Android Related Options"for screen,soft keyboard option.
" "
" "Buttons on bottom:
" "
" " Use Usb/Bluetooth keyboard if you have.
" " Even without such keyboard,
" " with limited terminal keyboard or IM-soft-kbd,
" " you cau utilize function keys by these buttons setting.
" "
" " Kbd:show xe's soft keyboard enabling operations
" " like as on PC keyboard/mouse.
" " See "Axe Help" for keyboard usage.
" " Button setting has no effect to input from xe' soft-kbd.
" " IM :pop-up default Input Method.
" " You can change it by "Settings"
" " ==>"Android Related Option"==>"Current Input Method".
" " (Android IM will not popup when hardware kbd is connected.)
" " S.C:Shortcut. For ex, pressing "1" key
" " on hardware keyboard or IM soft kbd
" " after touching "S.C" button will generate
" " "F1" as default setting.
" " Note. "S.C","Shift","1"==>S.C+"@"
" " "Shift","S.C","1"==>Shift+"F1".
" " ("Settings"==>"Button Configuration"
" " ==>"Shortcut Key Assign")
" " Terminal Button such as "Search", "Camera"
" " can be used as Shortcut.
" " ("Button Configuration"==>"Terminal Button Usage")
" " Shift/AltG:When your hardware kbd has no AltG key 
" " or you want to change keycode mapping with +Shift key,
" " use this to change mapping.
" " ("Button Configuration"
" " ==>"Shift Key mapping"/"AltGr Key mapping")
" " 
" " Buttons layout is configurable.
" " ("Button Configuration"==>"Button Layout")
" " Long press on the button pop-ups dialog
" " to change button's function.
" " For directionkeys long press with "S.C" on.
"

"==Keyboard:
" " Function key usage is almost same as PC version.
" " (Enter "A" on top panel, Key:Function mapping will be shown.
" " xe has originally config file:xe.ini for function key
" " configuration.
" " "ini" cmd write xe.ini, edit it by "e ::xe.ini" cmd. See "XE Help")
" " If your terminal has not hardware keyboard,
" " Touch "Kbd" button to pop-up PC like keyboard to enables
" " function key input.
" " You can customize this keyboard layout
" " ("Menu"==>"Settings"==>"Kbd Layout").
" " Max 4 additional key(Shift/AltGr/Shift+AltGr/FunctionKey) is
" " assignable to each key, and those are corresponding
" " to flick left/right/up/down action.
" " You can set On/Off of displaying flick action keycode
" " on Android Related Options dialog.
" " Long press pop-ups mini-keyboard to select it
" " for non-repeatable keys.
" " Non-repeatable is Shift, Alt, Ctrl, IM and Esc.
" " For repeatable keys, mini-keyboard is shown
" " when pop-up mode.
" " To switch to pop-up mode, long press "IM" on the keyboard
" " and select "Pop".
" " (back to "IM" when re-touched "Pop")
" " 
" " Click "IM" to switch to native Input Method
" " for composite characters.
" " To activate S.C(shortcut) Flick-Right on "IM" button.
" " (or select "S.C" from mini-keyboard)
" " S.C is effective only for next one key event.
" " Flick right/up on "Alt" key shows AltGr/Shift+AltGr characters.
" " Flick up/right on "Shift" key shows "Caps"/"SYM".
" " "SYM" means "Caps" and ASCII symbol character.
" " defined on the 4th(code for Flick-Down).
" "
" "==Mouse:
" " Click/DoubleClick/Drag/RightButtonClick are available
" " by finger touch.
" " (
" " RightButtonClick is by long click, timeout value is one of
" " Android Related Options.
" " But after dragging for Cut and Paste,
" " use menu popup-ed by titlebar touch.
" " (right most 1/3 of titlebar is shortcut to FileChooser
" " dialog for <Android3.0)
" "
" " Use not kbd but menu to paste for clipboard contents
" " copyed out of xe.
" " )
" " It may be hard to point the character cell on small screen,
" " you can alternatively assign these mouse action
" " to keyboard's action.
" " Assign those to S.C. ex) S.C+"w":DoubleClick.
" " ("Button Configuration"==>"ShortCut Key Assign")
" " or Terminal button such as "Search" "Camera".
" " ("Button Configuration"==>"Terminal Button Usage").
" " Note. When using DoubleClick key, pay attention
" " to the current cursor position
" " which may changes the function derived.
" "
" "==Ruler:
" " You can optionally show ruler(Vertical/Horizontal/CrossHair)
" " at cursor position.
" " ("Settings"==>"Other XE Options"==>"Ruler Type".
" "
" "==Font:
" " When you installed or selected new font, restart xe
" " to clear internal memory related to font glyph width.
" " It takes considerable time at next start
" " if font style was changed.
" "
" "==HomeDir:
" " "~/" and environment variable HOME is as following.
" " /data/data/com.xe.Axe/files/myhome
" " Current directory set to HomeDir by "cd" cmd,
" " "cd" is effective also for next session.
" "
" "==WorkDir:
" " xe's work directory referenced by "::" like as "e ::filename"
" " is as following.
" " /data/data/com.xe.Axe/files/xewd
" "
" "==Intent :
" " -xe can accept following intent from othor application.
" " Action:ACTION_VIEW and ACTION_EDIT
" " filter:scheme="file:", mimeType="*/*" not-specified
" " (eg. data="file://xxx")
" " -"ase" cmd sends "ACTION_SEND" intent
" " expecting some mailer will handle it.
" " ase [*|-|text-file]
" " [attachement-file|@attachment-filelist-file]
" " You can also include following information in text-file
" " in this sequence.
" " To:address-send-to(it may be myltiple lines)
" " Subject:title
" " File:attachment-file(it may be multiple lines)
" " Text:(start of text)
" " On dir-list panel attachment file is selected
" " also by touch(click).
" " After "ase" cmd entry like as "ase -",
" " select file by touch before push "Enter".
" " To select multiple files, Ctrl+click adds the file
" " to attchement file list.
" " Shift+click adds the range of files to attchement file list.
" " "Enter" executes to send at last.
" " Drag-and-drop to titlebar line executes
" " the equaibalent function.
" " -line command "!" on dirlist panel,
" " issue "ACTION_SEND" intent
" " with MIME determined by file extention name.
" " The application declared to receive the MIME type
" " will be kicked.
" "
" "==EnvironmentVariable:
" " "env" command is missing, use "set" command.
" " Following PATH is added for additional shell-script
" " and utility PGM.
" " files/sh:files/bin:/data/busybox
" " (
" " xe's utility will be installed into files/bin
" " by unzipping AxeAsset.zip at files/.
" " xe's utility will be installed into files/bin
" " by unzipping AxeAsset.zip at files/
" " Asset installation:Menu-->Settings
" " -->Download addtional asset.
" " )
" " You would be better to install busybox
" " which contains env, find, grep etc.
" " You can adjust PATH env-var on ArmRelatedOptions dialog
" " when you installed some utility commands
" " and use on =6 panel.
" " I recomend to install from web "busybox"
" " which contains mandatory tools such as "grep".
" " "LANG" may be UTF8, so to edit file by locale encoding,
" " specify "CPLC" for each file at 1st open time
" " like as "e file1 CPLC"." "
" "==ICU support
" " You can display EBCDIC file if you installed EBCDIC cnv file.
" " Folowings are contained in this package.
" " ibm37, ibm930(jp), ibm939(jp),
" " ibm1047(Latin1/OpenSystem)
" " 1141(Germany-Euro), 1144(Italy-Euro), 1145(Spain-Euro)
" " 1146(UK-Euro), 1147(France-Euro),
" " 1148(International-Euro)
" " For details,reffer html help
" "
" "==Syntax Highlight
" " highlight-2.16 by Andre Simon will be used.
" " (Install AxeAsset.zip)
" " To use highlight modify ::xesyna.cfg.
" " OPEN = n ==> OPEN = y
" "
" "==Download
" " You can download from specified URL,
" " and unzip into the specified local folder.
" "
" "==Crash Report
" " Configured to send mail of crash report to developer,
" " send it after checked contents of mail text.
"

""Ruler":vertical/Horizontal/Cross Hair line at the cursor position.
" ""FreeCursor":if ON, cursor wraps from edge of screen to another edge.
" " if OFF, screen shift occurs on file/directory panel
" " except when cursor is out of text area such as lineno field
" ""Beep":Beep when error detected.
" ""QuietExit":no confirmation at exit XE by Keyboard Function key.
" " "Exit" on option menu requires always confirmation.
"
"You can set Background-color and Ruler-color.\n" "Ruler is optionally shown by selecting Ruler-type on \"Other XE Options\".\n"

"Input is evaluated when focus was lost, and sample text is re-drawn.
" "Select font family from drop down list.
" "if "Font Size"=0,it is determined by "Row-H" and "Column-W".
" "if "Row H"=0, set to same as "Font Size"
" "if "Column W"=0, set to half of "Row H".
" "if all values are =0, "Font Size" is determined as to fit to screen size by row=24 and col=80.
"

"You can use Terminal button as alternative of function key
" "You can use up to max 9 entry for other not-predefined terminal button.
" "
" "ex) To assign "Back" button to "F3" key,
" " select "F3" from drop down list after focused to "Back" line
" "You can select mouse action from the drop down.
" " "Mouse-Rbtn":Mouse right button for context menu pop-up
" " "Mouse-Drag":use at the point Drag-start and Drag-end
" " to specify Cut and Paste range.
" "To use User_(_:1==>9), enter decimal Android keycode at first, the select function from dropdown
" "ex) After entered "168"(keycode:ZOOM_IN), select "Esc".
" "Then, "ZOOM_IN" button is treated as "Esc" key.
"

"Download and Expand file.(zip,tar,tgz,tar.gz,bz2,tbz2)
" "When expand only,specify local file in Local File:,
" "or folder in Local File: and filename in URL:.
" "And also used to download following addtional asstes files
" "(Menu-->Settings-->Download additional Asset)
" " help html files.
" " commandline utilities executed on terminal soft.
" " highlight data used by syntax highlight function.
" "These files (about 14MB) ware split from apk to reduce apk size.
" "This asset file is not mandatry, but to use above functions, download once.
"
Specify compressed filename in URL column
"Enter Non-alphanumeric 1 byte Char or Hex notation Unicode"

"Qwerty layout will be changed such as exchange "Y" and "Z",
" "and assignable max 4 code to a key such as function key, symbol character and unicode.
" "Each are corresponding to modifier keys of Shift, AltGr, Shift+AltGr and 4th is for Flick-Down.
" "You can select it by flick operation. Flick-Left:Shift, Right:AltGr, Up:Shift+AltGr
" "Flick right/up on "Alt" key shows AltGr/Shift+AltGr characters.
" " (See "Axe Help")
" "
" "Input Alpha-numeric(ex. "Q"), Symbol(ex. "#") or Unicode by Hex notation(ex. "a2").
" "To set ExtendedKey(ex. "F12") select from pull-down after cursor setting to the line.
" "Use 4 byte unicode like as "00f1" to distinguish FunctionKey-F1.
"
Long press timeout for Mouse Right Button(ms)

"Orientation:fix to Landscape/Portrait or Rotate by sensor.
" "Current Input Method:Default Input Method; push "Change" button to select the other.
" "Close XeKbd by outside touch:If Off,outside touch is effective as usual.
" "Reset Shift/Ctrl/Alt each time:reset modifier after input.
" "Keycode when Home Icon clicked:kecode generated by Home Icon Click.
" "Long press timeout for Mouse Right Button:Event fires by long pressing in this time(ms).
" "Locale Charset:Locale Codepage used to translate to/from UTF-8.
" " Default is ISO-8859-1/EUC-JP/EUC_KR/Big5/GB18030 depending to locale code.
" "Repeat Delay:on xe's soft keyboard, repeatable key's delay(milisec) to generate key event.
" " Adjust enough not to generate key event before flick detection.
" "Repeat Speed:interval(milisec) to generate repeated event.
" "Display Flick KeyCode:Display Keycode on Keyboard generated by Flick operation.
" "Flick Timeout:Flick operation should end within this milisec.
" " On Soft-Keyboard, KeyDown Event is delayed until this period expire.
" " On Screen, it is "Drag" operation if you did not touch-up in this time.
" "Flick Distance:minimum swipe distance for "Flick". % of screen height/width.
" " (On soft-keyboard, this is fixed ro 50% of the key height/width.)
" "env-PATH: ex) /data/busybox:$PATH
"
"Enter Non-alphanumeric 1 byte Char or Hex notation Unicode"
"Enter Non-alphanumeric 1 byte Char or Hex notation Unicode for AltGr Char."
Enter Char-code or Unicode when with Shift Button
Enter Extended-key Name or Select from DropDdwn list
Enter Char-code or Unicode when with AltGr/Shift+AltGr button
failed to install highlight to bin folder

"Set Button count of 2 lines to be displayed at bottom when portrait style.
" "Valid count is 0 to 8.
" "
" "You can use long-click on the button to maintain each
" " except direction buttons(Left,Right,Up/Down).
" "To enable long-click for direction buttons,
" " temporally check-on "Disable repeatable" on "Buttons Layout" dialog
" " or long-click with Shortcut:On.
" "You may delete some buttons to widen editor panel,
" "if you have terminal with appropriate hardware key.
" "(Move value is shift count and minus means forward shift.)
" "
" "all buttons in a line if Landscape: show buttons in a line if landscape mode
"

"Specify one byte ASCII symbol character or Unicode by Hex-Notation to be generated by the key with "Shift" button.
" "For ex, if you set "3e" on the line "2e (.)",
" "code U-003e is generated when pressed key "." accompanied with "Shift" button.
" "
" "You can back to default 101 or 106(Japanese default) keyboard layout.
"

"Specify keycode generated when the key is pressed accompanied with "S.C" button.
" "You can enter Keyname or Hex-Notation Unicode
" "If combination required, pay attention to touching sequence.
" ""S.C","Shift","1" : S.C+"@", "Shift","S.C","1" : Shift+"F1"
" "
" "Pop-up dialog will assist your input when you click the line.
" "Select Extended key from drop-down or enter Unicode by Hex-Notation after checking "unicode" on.
" "You can set Modifier Key (Shift/Control/Alt) CheckBox
" "to generate such as Alt+F1 key.
". "(Note)Extended key:"PEnt":Enter on NumPad
" " :"Mouse-Rbtn":Mouse right button for context menu pop-up
" " :"Mouse-Drag":use at the point Drag-start and Drag-end
" " to specify Cut and Paste range.
"

"Specify one byte Character or Unicode by Hex-Notation to be generated by the key with "AltGr" button.
" "For AltGr+Shift case, define it at the shifted char.
" "ex). define for not "8" but "*", then touch in the sequence of "AltGr", "Shift" and "8".
"

"Select button's function type from drop down list except for Delete/Move case
" "Move value is position shift count and minus means forward shift.
" "
" "To enable this pop-up dialog for direction key button,
" "those work as repeatable key, disable repeatable
" "on "Buttons layout" dialog from button configuration menu.
"
"Press Button to process the current folder."

"--- Dialog for file "Open","New" and "SaveAs" ---
" "
" "Filter: Enter file selection by extension list or wildcard.
" " enclose by " for regular expression.
" " ex) .c .c|.h xe* xe?cmd* ".*\.cpp$|.*\.h$"
" "Apply: apply Filetr.
" "Sort-N: Sort by filename. Asc/Des is toggled.
" "Sort-T: Sort by timestamp.
" "Detail: Show/Hide timestamp.
" "Parent: back to the parent folder.
" "
" "Listview when "Open"
" " click: select the line.
" " click selected folder: open the folder.
" " click selected file: open the folder.
" "Listview when "SaveAs"
" " click:set to "NewName", you can use it for renaming.
" "
" "Edit: open the selected file/folder by Edit mode.
" When "NewFile", Edit "NewName" of the selected folder.
" "Browse: open the selected file/folder by Browse mode.
" "Save : save to "NewName" in the selected folder.
"
Try double tap if U could not scroll to bottom
"Too large text file, specify as attach file."
"Unhandled Exception occurred.\nPlease agree to mail Crash-Report to developer."
Axe JNI Crash.\n(Please agree to mail Crash-Report to developer.)\n================================"
